title: Redefining connectivity across borders: Introducing Global-EX by Nomad - Japan Today
text:
In a world where seamless connectivity is paramount, Nomad, a trailblazer in innovative technological solutions, proudly presents Global-EX – a cutting-edge product designed to transcend geographical barriers and revolutionize the way we stay connected across borders. With an extensive reach covering 54 or 81 countries worldwide, all within a single eSIM, Global-EX offers unparalleled convenience and connectivity like never before. What sets Global-EX apart is not just its comprehensive coverage but also its flexibility, with data validity options of 180 or 365 days, add-on data availability, and support for hotspot and tethering functionalities, making it a versatile choice for modern-day connectivity needs.
Key Features of Global-EX 1. Extensive Global Coverage:
Global-EX Plans come with two options: one bundle covers 54 countries, and the other covers 81 countries worldwide, with long validity of 180 days and 365 days, ensuring that users stay connected wherever their journey takes them. Travelers can choose to buy 10 GB to last 180 days, or 20 / 30 / 50 GB to last 365 days. Whether it's for business or leisure, Global-EX provides a reliable network in a multitude of destinations.
2. Long Data Validity:
Say goodbye to the hassle of installing multiple eSIMs or of frequent recharges with Global-EX's data validity options of 180 or 365 days. This extended validity period ensures uninterrupted connectivity, allowing users to stay connected without the need to install multiple eSIMs or for constant data top-ups.
3. Flexible Add-On Data:
Need additional data or to extend your data validity on the go? Global-EX offers convenient add-on data packages, allowing users to tailor their connectivity needs according to their usage patterns. This flexibility ensures that users always have access to the data they require. You can always extend the validity of your Global-EX eSIM for even longer than 365 days by purchasing an add-on data pack.
4. Hotspot and Tethering Support:
Share your connection effortlessly with Global-EX's hotspot and tethering support. Whether you're working on multiple devices or traveling with companions, Global-EX makes it easy to share your connectivity and stay productive on the go.
Embracing Seamless Connectivity 1. For Avid Travelers:
For individuals with exciting travel plans that span the globe, Global-EX is the ultimate travel companion. Say goodbye to the fear of exorbitant roaming charges and the hassle of purchasing local SIM cards on every trip. With Nomad Global-EX, users can embark on multiple adventures with confidence, relying on the same eSIM and same plan each time.
2. For Business Professionals:
Business professionals who traverse international borders frequently understand the value of time. With Global-EX, the inconvenience of switching SIM cards or setting up eSIMs before each trip becomes a thing of the past. Stay connected seamlessly and focus on what truly matters – achieving your business objectives.
3. For Frequent Return Trips:
If you find yourself making multiple return trips to the same destination each year, Global-EX offers a hassle-free solution. With Global-EX, users can stay connected the moment they arrive at their second home, eliminating the need for repeated installations and ensuring continuous connectivity.
Experience Unparalleled Connectivity with Global-EX Global-EX by Nomad redefines the boundaries of connectivity, empowering users to stay connected wherever life takes them. Embrace a world without connectivity barriers and experience the freedom of seamless connectivity with Global-EX.
